consumptionAlert: Your consumption is higher than your production. Please destroy or build some buildings to solve this issue.
energyT1-desc1: Gains Energy slowly from the sun without using any resources.
energyT2-desc1: Burns Carbon to produce a steady source of Energy.
energyT3-desc1: Burn powerful methane from Venus to satisfy all your power needs.
energyT4-desc1: Uses fission to create large amounts of power.
energyT5-desc1: The Magmatic Dynamo is a method of producing power by using lava as a fuel. Because of the extreme temperature of lava, a lot of Energy can be produced at once.
energyT6-desc1: In a fusion reaction, Energy is released when two light atomic nuclei are fused together to form one heavier atom. This is the same reaction that occurs in stars and produces a lot of power.
plasmaGain-desc1: Manually gain Plasma from Energy and Hydrogen
plasmaT1-desc1: The Super-Heater throws electricity at Hydrogen to turn it into a plasmatic substance.
plasmaT2-desc1: This contraption converts Helium into Plasma by firing intensive energy bolts at the gas cloud.
plasmaT3-desc1: Bathing in Electrons. What could go wrong?
plasmaT4-desc1: The Quasar Redirection System is a colossal space station built from graphene, used to redirect quasar activity towards gas giants, to instantaneously convert the gases into plasma for collection.
meteoriteT1-desc1: Construct an automated way of producing meteorite without you having to do anything.
meteoriteT2-desc1: The Meteorite Web uses nano-fibres made while submerged in highly radioactive liquids to become strong enough to physically catch meteors from the Asteroid Belt. Plasma is required to refine the asteroids into Meteorite Ore, which can be usable.
meteoriteT3-desc1: Get meteorites the old-fashioned way: demolishing uninhabited exoplanets by firing high-energy particle beams at them, then collect the debris.
meteoriteT4-desc1: Bypass the need for demolishing planets entirely by building your own nebula to create meteorites instead!
carbonT1-desc1: All the wood that has been put to use is brought here to be cleaned of carbon traces and then repurposed.
carbonT2-desc1: Burns wood at very high temperatures to turn it into a finer type of carbon than Charred Wood Plants.
carbonT3-desc1: Uses lava to melt wood and then the mixture is cooled off, resulting in moderately pure carbon. The leftovers are re-used in the process
carbonT4-desc1: This plasma-fueled furnace burns so hot it turns wood into almost perfectly pure carbon, ready to be turned into high-purity carbon materials such as graphene.
techCarbonT5-desc1: Research to unlock 'Super Massive Pencil Sharpener'.
carbonT5-desc1: Who knew broken pencil tips would yield this much carbon?
scienceUpgrade-desc1: Multiply by 1.25 your Scientists storage size
scienceT1-desc1: Build a small laboratory of your very own to start training scientists.
scienceT2-desc1: Build a more effective laboratory to continue your quest into the realm of science at a significantly faster speed.
scienceT3-desc1: Build an even better version of the old laboratory to further your exploration of the realm of science.
scienceT4-desc1: Create an observatory to gaze upon the stars and acquire knowledge from them.
techScienceT5-desc1: Research to unlock 'Space Scientific Satellite Station'.
scienceT5-desc1: From outside Earth's orbit, the universe can be understood much more efficiently without an atmosphere obstructing the lab's view.
oilT1-desc1: Build a small pump to extract Oil from the ground.
oilT2-desc1: Pumpjacks are much bigger than small pumps and produce Oil on an industrial scale but they require a lot of Energy.
oilT3-desc1: Oil Fields are large open spaces, usually found in deserts where vast oil wells can be found under the ground.
oilT4-desc1: Offshore Rigs are megastructures floating in the oceans, extracting Oil from under the sea-beds.
oilT5-desc1: Much better than the 8000 version, this fossilator reverses the fossil fuel cycle. Instead of burning, it creates them from carbon in the air.
fuelT1-desc1: Chemical plants are used to make rocket fuel automatically.
fuelT2-desc1: Oxidisation Chambers make rocket fuel faster and more efficiently than chemical plants.
fuelT3-desc1: These speed up the chemical reactions needed to make rocket fuel by using greenhouse gases such as methane.
metalT1-desc1: Build a pickaxe for your miner.
metalT2-desc1: Heavy Drills mine Metal at mass.
metalT3-desc1: Giga Drills extract Metal at colossal speeds.
metalT4-desc1: Quantum Drills bend the space-time continuum to get metal faster than physically possible.
metalT5-desc1: Drills metal from alternate realities where metal is plentiful.
gemT1-desc1: Build an improved pickaxe to mine Gems.
gemT2-desc1: Advanced Drills mine gem at mass. Because of the toughness of the drill needed it is slower than the heavy drill.
gemT3-desc1: The Diamond Encrusted Drill is one of the strongest drills in the solar system, and as such, can collect Gems faster than anything before it.
gemT4-desc1: Carbyne Drills one of the strongest drills in the solar system, and as such, can collect Gems faster than anything before it.
gemT5-desc1: This special container condenses Gem dioxide gas into diamonds, creating gems at a faster rate than any drill.
woodT1-desc1: Build an axe for your woodcutter.
woodT2-desc1: Laser Cutters slice trees (and fingers) quicker than axes and produce a lot more wood.
woodT3-desc1: This machine is the reason we're losing our rainforests. At least we get lots of wood!
woodT4-desc1: Creates Wood using old, useless materials found everywhere on Earth by crushing them and packing what remains as densely as possible until it can be used as Wood again.
woodT5-desc1: The great Russian forests span thousands of miles. More than enough for at least your lifetime. Let the younger generation deal with running out.
siliconT1-desc1: This type of blowtorch instantly turns sand into Silicon, but only on a small scale. To make it, extraterrestrial resources are required.
siliconT2-desc1: This tool almost melts parts of beaches to get silicon at a larger scale.
siliconT3-desc1: This weapon of mass destruction has been re-labelled and now hovers above coast-lines, or what is now left of them.
siliconT4-desc1: This large ship orbits around the planet, focused in the Sahara Desert, tearing up sand from Earth and turning it into Silicon under intense heat.
techSiliconT5-desc1: Research to unlock 'Time And Relative Dimensions In Sand'.
siliconT5: Time And Relative Dimensions In Sand
siliconT5-desc1: The TARDIS, for short, harnesses the power of stars from far away in space-time to heat sand into Silicon at record speeds. Don't ask why it has a polished wooden interior.
uraniumT1-desc1: Pulverizes Uranium for easy transportation out of deep mineshafts.
uraniumT2-desc1: This teleposes blocks of rock from far underground to the surface so that Uranium can be mined more easily.
uraniumT3-desc1: The Enricher increases the quality of uranium mined and thus allows more of the uranium in rocks to be used in your company.
uraniumT4-desc1: Recycles used-up Uranium to provide the resources with a second use. This greatly increases the amount of Uranium you can use per second.
uraniumT5-desc1: This huge factory is as large as a planet, fusing together Uranium from common elements.
lavaT1-desc1: You can use a modified crucible to pick up lava and to store it for later use.
lavaT2-desc1: This extracts lava from volcanoes automatically and quickly.
lavaT3-desc1: Instead of going out and finding lava, it can be more convenient to make it yourself with heat and pressure.
lavaT4-desc1: A melting pot of misery, pouring lava out from mined rock.
lavaT5-desc1: Condenses gases from the heart of Jupiter into liquid magma.
lunariteT1-desc1: Bribe local workers to mine your Lunarite.
lunariteT3-desc1: This quarry tears up the surface of the moon so much that it can be seen from Earth.
lunariteT4-desc1: This large machine dives deep into the Earth to find large pools of Lunarite found near the core. This is originally where the metal on the Moon comes from.
lunariteT5-desc1: And you wondered why we have a hundred moons in the sky?
methaneT1-desc1: Sucks in methane and cleans the planet at the same time!
methaneT3-desc1: These hold cows genetically moodified to produce methane constantly
methaneT4-desc1: Collect gas from deep sea vents on the ocean floor of Titan.
titaniumT1-desc1: Hire explorers to search for Titanium on the surface, uncovered by winds on Mars.
titaniumT2-desc1: These Lunarite Drills are extremely powerful, needed to mine out Titanium from inside Mars' crust.
titaniumT3-desc1: This is a mining machine modified to have 5 drills on its face. This allows for a massive increase in resources gained per second.
titaniumT4-desc1: This mighty drill is said to have been wielded by Titans themselves, many milennia ago.
titaniumT5-desc1: You shoot me down, but I won't fall. I am Titanium.
goldT1-desc1: Powered by Methane, this droid scouts the asteroids for gold deposits.
goldT2-desc1: Mines through asteroids to find Gold. It is much more effective than the simple droid.
goldT3-desc1: That's no moon! That's a Space Station! This cuts through asteroids to expose all of the Gold in the centers.
goldT4-desc1: Speeds up time through quantum physics in order to produce even more Gold.
goldT5-desc1: Transmutation has progressed to being able to turn thin air into gold!
silverT1-desc1: The Scout Ship searches through the asteroid field for pieces of silver embedded in asteroids.
silverT2-desc1: Cuts through asteroids to find silver deposits in their cores.
silverT3-desc1: This large, space drill, named after the World War One Howitzer built almost a milienia ago, is a silver seeking machine specially designed for mining asteroids.
silverT4-desc1: This powerful cannon orbits Neptune and can atomise the surface of asteroids, revealing the silver within.
silverT5-desc1: The Silver bullets used to kill werewolfs are made from silver that has been compressed well over 1000 times. Extracting them will prove beneficial for your production.
hydrogenT1-desc1: This collector travels around Jupiter seeking Hydrogen to store to bring back to Earth.
hydrogenT2-desc1: The magnet attracts the Hydrogen to it to increase the amount collected per second.
hydrogenT3-desc1: These are made here on Earth and can turn water into hydrogen with a constant supply of Energy.
hydrogenT5-desc1: 'Stealing' is such a strong word. I prefer 'borrowing without return' when we harvest the outer regions of stars.
heliumT1-desc1: The Helium Drone scouts out the area on Saturn and picks out spots high in Helium which are then mined slowly by it.
heliumT2-desc1: This huge tanker holds large amounts of Helium and transports it from Saturn to Earth through the vacuum of space.
heliumT3-desc1: The Compressor packs helium densely into a small space so that it can be easily transported back to Earth.
heliumT4-desc1: Flying into Gas Giants' atmospheres with a big bucket is the best plan we've had yet!
heliumT5-desc1: A contained miniature version of the sun uses nuclear fusion to create massive amounts of helium.
iceT1-desc1: The Ice Pickaxe is the simplest way of mining frozen water, and although it is the cheapest, it is the slowest.
iceT2-desc1: The Ice Drill is more effective than the Pickaxe and gains much more Ice every second. However, it does use electricity.
iceT3-desc1: With advanced technology, you are now able to turn Earth's water into high-quality Ice, previously only found on Pluto.
iceT4-desc1: This robot is the coolest guy in the solar system.
iceT5-desc1: Drain heat out of the ingredients so fast that you're not sure how to process it safely, but you managed to do it properly anyway.
antimatterT1-desc1: This powerful reactor can turn high-energy plasma into the most efficient fuel we can imagine.
missionFirst-desc1: Welcome! Your mission is to mine resources to build machines to explore universe and conquer stars.
missionFirst-desc2: First things to do are to manually gain Metal, Wood and Gem to build your first T1 machines to automate resource production. By doing that you will unlock Science. Building science machine will allow you to research technologies to unlock more content.
missionStorage-desc1: This will allow you to build storage upgrades to increase the maximum on the amount of resource you can have at once.
missionSolarPanel-desc1: Solar Panels produce Energy without the need for Fuel, but they do it slower than other forms of Energy production.
missionEnergy-desc1: You will be able to produce power from steam engines using Carbon made from wood in a furnace.
missionOil-desc1: Oil used to fuel more advanced machines that gather resources and also to produce more power than basic means. Unlocking Oil Processing allows you to extract it from the ground.
missionTier2-desc1: Resource Machines produce more resources than simple methods but require a constant supply of power to work.
missionDestruction-desc1: This allows you to destroy machines you have already created. It can be useful when there are more efficient methods of gaining resources, or if you don't have enough energy to support your machines.
missionFuel-desc1: Unlocking space-travel allows for launching of rockets and opens a whole new field of research.
missionRocket1-desc1: Building a rocket will allow for exploration around the solar system and will allow you to gather resources in space.
missionRocket1-desc2: To launch the rocket into space, it must first be built.
missionRocket2-desc1: Launching the rocket into space will unlock space mining, exploration and other planets. This requires a satellite for navigation.
missionMoon-desc1: The Moon is our largest satellite, revolving around the Earth once every 27 days. It contains a large quantity of Lunarite, left over from when it separated from the Earth billions of years ago. It is much stronger than regular Metal and used to build more advanced machines.
missionMercury-desc1: Mercury is a lifeless rock with little to no value. It is not worth exploring on the ground as there are no valuable materials present.
missionVenus-desc1: Venus is the hottest planet in the solar system and the closest one to Earth. It is rich in greenhouse gases, contributing to its extreme heat. You can extract Methane from Venus, which allows you to build up a new form of power generation.
missionMars-desc1: Mars is the second closest planet to Earth and is covered in red iron oxide, also called rust. You can find Titanium on the surface, but it is more common inside the crust. Titanium will allow for Methane power plants and Silicon production.
missionAsteroid-desc1: The asteroid belt is a vast space with nearly 2 million asteroids. There you can harvest rare metals on Earth more easily, such as Silver.
missionWonderStation-desc1: The Wonder Station is a large, mysterious construct. What it contains isn't known exactly, but carvings on ancient artifacts depict something similar. They say that there, you will learn about commanding over the galaxy. They say that it will be able to teach you many things on your journey to inter-star and galactic exploration.
missionJupiter-desc1: An orbital station would be ideal to harvest Hydrogen from Jupiter's atmosphere. Make it so!
missionSaturn-desc1: We struck gold! Figuratively at least. The second largest planet in the solar system, next to Jupiter. It is one of the few celestial bodies in our solar system to have rings and is the least dense planet in the solar system. You can find Helium here.
missionUranus-desc1: The planet that rotates differently from everyone else has winds up to 300 miles per hour (483kph). Its composition is much like that of the other gas giants, mainly composed of Hydrogen and Helium.
missionUranus-desc2: Because of this, it is not worth exploring to get the same resources as in Saturn and Jupiter.
missionNeptune-desc1: Neptune has the strangest weather in the solar system. There are huge storms and winds that are more violent than any other in the solar system.
missionNeptune-desc2: There is not much there but Methane, Hydrogen and Helium.
missionPluto-desc1: Ice, ice, baby! With large quantities of Ice being extremely expensive to create on Earth, it's actually cheaper to harvest it from Pluto!
missionKuiper-desc1: Vast stretches of space separate lonely rocks floating in a 300 year orbit around the sun. Still, there is something of great importance to be found here.
missionSolCenter-desc1: « Welcome to our home. Our race is dedicated to scientific progress and interacting with others. If you wish to trade with us, we can provide you blueprints for technology that few in the galaxy have ever seen. »
missionWonderStation2-desc1: As you enter the revolving pyramids, floating through space, you feel a small tug on your spacecraft as it gravitates towards an opening doorway in the side of the lowest section. Exiting your spacecraft, you experience the artificial gravity and walk to the large hallway ahead.
missionWonderStation2-desc2: Adorning the walls are four huge paintings of monolithic structures in the corners of the room with descriptions underneath. At the far end of the room is a giant door, closed without any indication of being able to open. You feel that there is a higher being watching over you as you walk through the room.
missionWonderPrecious-desc1: The first painting depicts a large, shiny structure and the plaque reads:
missionWonderPrecious-desc2: « While I am rich beyond comparison, I still value adding precious resources to my collection. In return for your Gems, Silver, and Gold, I will teach you about something that lies inside your own planet, allowing you to find a rare resource and dangerous element previously unfound. »
missionWonderEnergetic-desc1: A pulsating image depicts a huge pyramid, with sparks of lightning. What could the Overlord want now?
missionWonderEnergetic-desc2: « Having drained many stars of their energy, I want a structure built in honor of the energy I have taken from the galaxy with my mighty power. In return for building this, I will grant you ways to generate a form of power no man has been able to harness before. »
missionWonderTechnological-desc1: A green-tinted picture shows the inside of some computer system.
missionWonderTechnological-desc2: « With my technological superiority over anyone in the cosmos, I want a monument dedicated to the advanced computer systems I control. As a reward, I will teach you about computerized machines and give you the ability to make more advanced resource gatherers. »
missionWonderMeteorite-desc1: A blazing red portrait depicts a futuristic set of machines.
missionWonderMeteorite-desc2: « You have accomplished much so far, but now you face building a great structure to last generations. For my next monument, I will gift you with a new type of machine only seen in science-fiction. »
missionPlasma-desc1: Plasma being a state of extreme energy, it can be used as a storage of large amounts and provides the ability to use higher tier machines and transmutations.
missionEmc-desc1: EMC is a technology only dreamt about back on Earth. Here, it's a reality. You can turn energy and plasma into regular resources, or, with large amounts, you can turn it into rare ones, which you are unable to find and have to make to acquire.
missionMeteorite-desc1: Meteorite machines use the energy installed in them to convert Plasma into raw power useful in extracting resources.
missionDyson-desc1: This technology, unheard of previously, is now a reality, thanks to those in the Wonder Station. The Sphere can provide much energy for millions of years, but at what cost?
missionRebirth-desc1: So here we are, at what seems like the end of your journey, but what you don't realise... is that this is just the beginning. Gazing up at the stars, you wonder what you could do with all of your newfound wealth and your empire in the Solar System.
missionRebirth-desc2: Suddenly, the Overlord reaches out to you and says:
missionRebirth-desc3: « You have come far in your time, and I feel that your life is slowing to an end after a long life of empire building. However, you have not met the expectations I thought you would. »
missionRebirth-desc4: « Despite disappointing me and not achieving as much greatness as I would have liked, because of your loyalty and your dedication to me, I am prepared to give you another chance at life. »
missionRebirth-desc5: « You will start over, a new life, but in exchange for your soul, I will reward your next self with the knowledge you have gained during your time in this universe and one of the most valuable materials in this side of the multiverse: Dark Matter. »
missionRebirth2-desc1: « You will have many chances to impress me, as I will give you the ability of redemption when you feel the time has come and sacrifice is necessary. Your empire will grow even greater than before every time you rebirth, and as long as your allegiance lies with me, I will show you the way to galactic domination. »
missionWonderComm-desc1: In the center of the room, you see a smouldered antenna dish, lying on the floor. A plaque next to it says 'Original Comms Relay between my first two star systems'. A loud voice booms again from the speakers at the far corners of the floor:
missionWonderComm-desc2: « This is one of my most prized memorabilia, reminding me of the first message I sent between star systems. I will be elated if you repair this for me, and in return, I will help you on your mission to colonise the stars. »
missionWonderComm-desc3: For rebuilding the Communication Wonder, you will be able to talk and listen to aliens in other star systems and determine whether there is sentient life outside of our solar system.
missionWonderAntimatter-desc1: In the corner of the floor, you see a faintly glowing, large canister, propped up against the walls. The announcing message plays after pressing a red button next to it:
missionWonderAntimatter-desc2: « This was my first Antimatter tank for the maiden voyage of 'The Interstellar', on my first trip to another star system. For repairing it and bringing back the memories, I will teach you about your own antimatter production to fuel your dreams of escaping your small piece of the universe. »
missionWonderAntimatter-desc3: For rebuilding the Antimatter Wonder, you will gain access to antimatter production and storage.
missionWonderPortal-desc1: An obsidian-looking giant-sized frame stands out in the room, mounted on the far wall of the floor. It's plaque reads:
missionWonderPortal-desc2: « This is the pathway to the final floor of my mystical Wonder Station. It takes many resources to activate it, but once completed, will grant you access to the Stargate: The only way you will find your way out of this pathetic Solar System and explore the Cosmos. »
missionWonderPortal-desc3: Activating the Portal will allow you to go through it to get to the final floor of the Wonder Station, detached from the rest of the tetrahedral monolith.
missionWonderStargate-desc1: The final floor, despite being the smallest, appears to be the trophy room, displaying an imposing control panel and a large table.
missionWonderStargate-desc2: For rebuilding the Stargate, you will be able to explore outer space, beyond your own solar system.
missionSpaceship-desc1: This is where you can construct your transport to the stars.
missionSpaceship-desc2: Starship can travel to Stars in the Milky Way, but cannot land on objects within the systems.
missionShield-desc1: This plating combats the Sun's radiation, and can protect anyone inside from the frigid cold of space.
missionEngine-desc1: These combine antimatter with matter in a controlled reaction to create propulsion that will carry you to the stars.
missionAero-desc1: These allow for easy takeoffs and landings out of atmospheres so that you don't have to worry about air resistance.
missionEnlighten-desc1: With your vast amounts of dark matter, you find you have fulfilled your company to great success. Watching your interstellar empire, commanded by you, yourself, you feel the Overlord's presence come upon you. This is to be the next stage in your long journey for galactic supremacy.
missionEnlighten-desc2: « You have come far in your many lives, my loyal subject, but I know you can do more. Do not worry, you have not failed me yet. I will start you in a new dimension, almost identical to this one, where you may start afresh. »
missionEnlighten-desc3: « In this new dimension, you will travel further, and conquer more than ever before, as you will have my precious Ultrite, and my faithful resource titans by your side at each step. »
missionEnlighten-desc4: « With this heightened power, I truly believe you are capable of greatness, spreading our empire over the galaxy. Go forth into this new dimension and come out stronger for it! »
missionEnlighten-desc5: The Overlord's aura leaves you astounded, before promptly transporting you into a foreign world, devoid of industrialisation, yet familiar. You gaze up at the stars as you have done many times before, and set off to build a space company, bigger and better than ever before.
missionOverlord-desc1: « It is time to meet each other. If you build 150 statues devoted to my glory, I will plan a meeting to teach you the last secret. »
meetModal-text1: « Dear one, you have exceeded my expectations, well done. I did not think you had the capability to conquer this galaxy, I admit I underestimated your talent. You’ve gone great lengths to achieve these accomplishments, and of course, you must be rewarded. Now that you are powerful enough, you are finally worthy enough to join me, working by my side for the rest of time. It is time. Bow before me, and accept your rightful place. »
meetModal-text2: With your immense power, you decide to make a fatal move. Focusing the power of the galaxy you now control, you launch one single attack against the overlord you’ve worked for all this time. It is time. The end. Caught by surprise, the overlord is quickly defeated in a flurry of destruction.
meetModal-text3: You now look back across your realm, pure energy coursing through your veins. You feel supernatural. As the new overlord, it is your duty to care for and oversee the domain under your control, protecting the order within the dimension. You see a tiny person, living their humble beginnings on a tiny planet and decide to give them a helping hand. They wish to start their own new company. An NG Space Company!
radarT1-desc1: The Overlord gifts you with the technology to discover stars in outer space by using the IRS. Each one increases the exploration range by 1 Light Year.
radarT2-desc1: A huge problem with the theory of interstellar space travel is on the verge of being broken. Make it happen with this, increasing your exploration range by 5 Light Years.
shipT1-desc1: Scout ships are the smallest and fastest ships and cost the least of all. Despite their seemingly little worth, they are important in battle and in numbers, can be deadly.
shipT2-desc1: Larger than scouts, Frigates are among the smaller side of ship warfare. They have more power than scouts, but are significantly slower.
shipT3-desc1: The Corvette is a mid-sized ship with decent speed, given its other attributes. What it lacks in defense, it makes up for in power and speed and is a good ship to populate your fleets with.
shipT4-desc1: The Battle Cruiser is a costly investment, but pays off with a balanced mix of power, defense and speed. It is a high-end ship, both in terms of attributes and cost.
shipT5-desc1: The Capital Ship is a Defense-heavy ship, but can still pack a punch with it's large attack force. The main downside is the slow speed, dragging the fleet's manoeuvrability down.
carnelian-desc1: A ruthless faction with a fierce anger towards the ones in power, most notable, the Prasnian Empire.
carnelian-desc2: They are incessant in their opposition and focus their whole force towards attacking their enemies.
prasnian-desc1: The current leader in the galaxy and the faction most focused on keeping things as they are.
prasnian-desc2: Opposed to change, they have an authoritarian regime and offer rewards to everyone helping them to keep it as it is.
hyacinite-desc1: The Hyacinite Congregation is a science loving society, proud of all advances in technology and always looking to the future.
hyacinite-desc2: They fight for the truth and are welcoming to anyone who shares their beliefs.
kitrinos-desc1: This private company has grown powerful over the galaxy and is inspired by profits, with allies to those who can support their aims.
kitrinos-desc2: They are focus on passive gains, with a large amount of automation.
moviton-desc1: The Moviton Syndicate is an expansionist centred faction, with a goal of conquest over the galaxy.
moviton-desc2: They often play both sides of a conflict, hoping to gain from the chaos.
statue-desc1: Now an Overlord Statue can be built to celebrate our master!
segment-desc1: These mega-structures cannot possibly be built in one piece. They must be created from small sections and forged together around the sun.
dysonT1-desc1: The ring is a solar strip orbiting and circling the sun that can produce 5,000 energy per second. It requires 50,000 rocket fuel in total to put the sections in place.
dysonT2-desc1: The swarm is an array of solar stations orbiting the sun, and once built, it can produce 25,000 energy per second. However, it requires 250,000 rocket fuel in total to put the sections in place.
dysonT3-desc1: The entire sphere is a monolithic structure completely surrounding the sun. It will allow for enough energy to get interstellar travel and finally escape this Solar System. It will produce 1,000,000 energy per second.
darkmatter-desc1: Here, you can see how much Dark Matter you have acquired and the earnings you will receive upon Rebirth.
rebirth-desc1: Stepping forth into a new life is a great undertaking and not something to be done on a whim. Once certain, you may start afresh, maintaining the knowledge and experience you have gained from your previous life and renew yourself, achieving greater and faster than before. You will keep any unspent Dark Matter, as well as your upgrades.
rebirth-desc2: Taking this step is a huge leap in not just this life, but every single rebirth you ever have. Once activated, you will never feel this powerless again.
rebirth-confirm: Are you sure? This is non-reversible.
dmUpgdMultiGain-desc1: Unlocks all gain buttons. You will be able to manually gain resources with different count.
dmUpgdStartingStorage-desc1: Start with 6,400 max-storage on all resources every rebirth. (Does not affect if already over 6,400).
dmUpgdMultiBuild-desc1: Unlock powers of mass purchasing and destruction!
dmUpgdStorage-desc1: All Storages no longer cost 100% of the main resource, but instead, 75%.
dmUpgdAutoEmc-desc1: Activate it on an EMC resource and have that resource be 'EMCed' according to frequency.
dmUpgdTier5-desc1: Gain access to the research for fifth tier of resource machines.
dmUpgdDimensionRift-desc1: Opens a rift in the fabric of the multiverse, allowing you to store your resources in another dimension past your default capacity, up to 10x.
ultrite-desc1: There are many ways of gaining Ultrite in this galaxy. Here, you can see how much Ultrite you could acquire upon enlighten.
enlighten-desc1: Leaving your dimension leaves a lot of uncertainty. You will leave behind all that you have created, for a world familiar, yet different, as if waiting to be colonised, just for you.
enlighten-desc2: The galaxy lies just as it did here, unknowing of the power that will enter their dimension. The brave jump you must take to achieve true greatness is a calculated one, and only the ready will thrive. Are you ready?
enlighten-confirm: Are you sure? This is non-reversible.
ulUpgdStorage-desc1: A bonus discount of 25% is applied on resource storage. It works like the 'Storage Discount' and it is additive to it.
ulUpgdSpeed-desc1: With this upgrade double the speed stat of all your ships. It is cumulative with all other ship enhancement upgrades.
ulUpgdDefense-desc1: With this upgrade double the defense stat of all your ships. It is cumulative with all other ship enhancement upgrades.
ulUpgdPower-desc1: With this upgrade double the power stat of all your ships. It is cumulative with all other ship enhancement upgrades.
ulUpgdAutoStorage-desc1: This unlocks the ability to turn on/off the automation of upgrade storage on each resource.
titans-desc1: These are mystical beings, almost rivalling that of the Overlord. Resource Titans are wondrous beings, who smile fortunately on those who idolise them.
titans-desc2: Hiring a Titan will decrease the building cost of a single resource, on every machine and building by 90%, rounded down to the nearest integer.
donatingCardText1: I didn't like the intrusiveness of ads on this game and felt that getting people to pay for an in-game boost wouldn't bode well in the community as it makes the game feel like a freemium or pay-to-win game.
donatingCardText2: However, I like the donation system because there is nothing forcing you to donate other than out of the goodness of people's hearts. If you like the game and want more content faster, I would be happy to put more time towards this game if I felt that it is paying off.
donatingCardText3: Paypal donation allow you to call a Star as you want: donor stars give more bonuses! (contact me on Discord)
donatingCardText4: To be a Patreon supporter will give you even more advantages :)
donatingCardText5: Also, you can just buy me a 'Ko-fi' ;)
donatingCardText6: 'Freddec Games' is the name of my Paypal account.
importWarning: By importing V1 exported data you may have to adjust your production/consumption according to V2 mecanisms. Go to production/consumption to solve issues. In case of any problem, please contact Freddec on Discord.
savedDataCardText1: Copy and paste this onto a file somewhere so that you can import it into the game at a later date. You can also use this to create multiple 'savefiles' of the game by storing multiple instances separately.
reset-confirm: Are you sure? This is non-reversible.
infoCardText1: This game is made by me, Freddec, as a remake of the original game 'Space Company' from Sparticle999. Of course I have the authorization from Sparticle999 to do it. I made this game to improve my skills in VueJS and to get knowledge about incremental games.
infoCardText2: Here is the link to original game:
infoCardText3: Thank you to all supporters, donors and ko-fi mates: game is existing thank to you!
infoCardText4: Thank you to all testers and bug reporters: game is better thank to you!.
mobileText1: This device is not supported by web version
